CustomField.formula: Name +' has filed Income Tax Return for FY '+ Year_1__c +' and FY '+Year_2__c+' before due date of filing return as prescribed u/s 139(1) with acknowledgement Number '+ ITR_Acknowledgement_Number_1__c +' & '+ ITR_Acknowledgement_Number_2__c + ', Date of filing ' +TEXT(DAY( ITR_Filing_Date_1__c ))+"-" +TEXT(MONTH(ITR_Filing_Date_1__c))+"-" +TEXT(YEAR(ITR_Filing_Date_1__c))+' & '+TEXT(DAY( ITR_Filing_Date_2__c ))+"-" +TEXT(MONTH(ITR_Filing_Date_2__c))+"-" +TEXT(YEAR(ITR_Filing_Date_2__c))+' for the respectively. Therefore provision u/s 206AB & 206CCA is not applicable to us and TDS will be deducted at normal rate'
CustomField.label: ITR PDF Note
